mapper.select: SELECT distinct p2.title, s.sname, a.name, a.position, p.pno FROM SCHEDULE s, SCHPARTICIPANT p, PROJECT p2, ACCOUNT a WHERE s.sno in ( SELECT SNO FROM SCHPARTICIPANT WHERE userno = #{userno}) AND p2.pno in ( SELECT PNO FROM SCHPARTICIPANT WHERE userno = #{userno} ) AND p.userno = #{userno} AND a.userno in ( SELECT p2.PMNO FROM SCHEDULE s, SCHPARTICIPANT p, PROJECT p2 WHERE s.sno in ( SELECT SNO FROM SCHPARTICIPANT WHERE userno = #{userno}) AND p2.pno in ( SELECT PNO FROM SCHPARTICIPANT WHERE userno = #{userno} ) AND p.userno = #{userno} )
SELECT * FROM account WHERE joindate = ( SELECT max(JOINDATE) FROM account )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum cnt, a.* FROM account a WHERE 1=1
AND userno LIKE '%'||#{userno}||'%'
AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
ORDER BY userno DESC) where cnt between #{start} and #{end} ORDER BY cnt

SELECT count(*) FROM account WHERE 1=1
AND userno LIKE '%'||#{userno}||'%'
AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
SELECT dept, count(*) count FROM account GROUP BY dept
